Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class AdrenalineServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.AdrenalineServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAdrenalineServer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdrenalineServerRMI, AdrenalineServerSocket
    public abstract class AdrenalineServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAdrenalineServer
    This class contains all the info and methods that concern the server side, but are generic enough to be independent from the type of connection that the user has chosen

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdrenalineServer

        public AdrenalineServer​(Controller controller)
        Constructor. It assigns the input reference to the controller global parameter and subscribes to the bottleneck.exceptionGenerated event.
        Parameters:
        controller - Reference to the class that manages the multiple rooms

      • newServerCommand

        public void newServerCommand​(Command<IAdrenalineServer> command)

      • onExceptionGenerated

        protected void onExceptionGenerated()
        Method called when a connection exception comes up. The class unsubscribes to the events and notifies the controller about the newly occurred player's disconnection.

      • notifyPlayerDisconnected

        private void notifyPlayerDisconnected​(java.lang.String name)
        This method notifies the client about the disconnection of the player with the same name as the one represented by the input String
        Parameters:
        name - String that represents the name of the disconnected player

      • setName

        public void setName​(java.lang.String name)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Checks whether the name chosen by the user is available by communicating with the controller. If it is, it proceeds to ask what the available colors are and send them to the client. If it isn't, the client is notified that the chosen name is not available.
        Specified by:
        setName in interface IAdrenalineServer
        Parameters:
        name - Name chosen by the user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException

      • availableColors

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> availableColors()
        Asks the controller for an available room and gets the colors available in said room.
        Specified by:
        availableColors in interface IAdrenalineServer
        Returns:
        The available colors in the joined room.

      • setColor

        public void setColor​(int colorIndex)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Adds the player to the room by communicating their username and the chosen color to the controller.
        Specified by:
        setColor in interface IAdrenalineServer
        Parameters:
        colorIndex - Index of the color that has been chosen by the user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException

      • notifyIsHost

        private void notifyIsHost()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Checks whether the user associated to this class is the host of the room by communicating their name to the controller. If they are, the client is notified. Otherwise the user is put on ready status.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException

      • setGameLength

        public void setGameLength​(int gameLength)
        Communicates host's decision about the number of skulls to the controller
        Specified by:
        setGameLength in interface IAdrenalineServer
        Parameters:
        gameLength - Number of skulls that have been selected by the host

      • setGameMap

        public void setGameMap​(int choice)
        Communicates host's decision about the type of map to the controller
        Specified by:
        setGameMap in interface IAdrenalineServer
        Parameters:
        choice - Type of the map that has been selected by the host

      • removeEvents

        private void removeEvents()
        Checks whether a room has been joined already. If it is, this method unsubscribes from every event that this class was subscribed to via the setupRoomEvents method. Also, if the match has already started, this method unsubscribes the class from the modelUpdate event.

      • setupRoomEvents

        private void setupRoomEvents()
        Subscribes to all the events the server is interested in
